content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** **tools/materials ** * japanese size 7/0 & 10/0 crochet hooks 4 0 & 6 0mm * a little piece of interfacing or something stiff to put inside the bill most of hat is crocheted with three strands held together **note ** this same pattern appears again on the pierrot website with a different name and pattern photo it is called 28-36 2 on the pattern website and オーガニックコットンのキャスケット *ōganikku kotton no kyasuketto* in the pattern pdf the patterns are identical aside from name and recommended yarn however the yarn in the first version pierrot new cashmere 100 has been discontinued the recommended yarn in the second version is pierrot organic cotton 1 http //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/2728-omo48/ 2 http //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/28-36/
